summary.label:
Helpotusta urheiluseurojen harrastajien ja perheiden arkeen

Tuttu tilanne tuhansille urheilun harrastajille ja perheille on arjen suunnittelu treenien, pelien ja kisojen ehdoilla. myClubilla urheilullisen arjen hallinta on helppoa, kun koko perheen harrastusten tiedot löytyvät samasta paikasta. myClub-sovelluksella:

* ilmoittaudut tapahtumiin
* seuraat aktiivisuutta
* kommentoit tapahtumia ja seuraat keskustelua
* luet ja kommentoit tiedotteita
* tarkastelet ja maksat laskuja
* ostat seuratuotteita verkkokaupassa
* näytät jäsenkortin
* selaat seuran tai ryhmän yhteystietoja
* hallinnoit jäsentilin käyttäjiä
* tarkistat ja päivität jäsentietosi
* muokkaat tietosuoja-asetuksia.

Missä ne esikoisen futistreenit olivatkaan? Milloin kuopuksen uimakoulu alkaa? Ehdinkö omaan säbäpeliin? myClub-sovelluksella vältät kaaoksen. Kaikki perheen harrastustapahtumat tietoineen näkyvät samalla sivulla, vaikka lajeja harrastetaan eri seuroissa.

Tarvitseeko esikoinen kyydin treeneihin? Tapahtumiin liittyvä viestintä onnistuu vaivatta suoraan sovelluksessa. Kun joku vastaa viestiin, saat ilmoituksen puhelimeesi. myClub-ilmoituksia saat myös uusista tiedotteista ja laskuista. Pysyt siis varmasti ajantasalla, mitä seurassa, joukkueessa tai ryhmässä tapahtuu!

Oliko se kausimaksu hoidettu? Harrastustoiminnan laskut löydät ja kuittaat maksetuiksi kätevästi sovelluksessa. Jos seurasi hyödyntää myClub-verkkokauppaa, voit ostaa seuratuotteita sovelluksessa muutamalla napautuksella. Mikäli saat seurasi jäsenenä joitakin etuja, löydät jäsenkorttisi näppärästi sovelluksesta.

Ajoissa paikalla oikeassa paikassa. Kyydit sovittu ja laskut maksettu. Puhelin kiinni ja kentälle!

myClub-sovelluksen käyttö edellyttää, että sinulla on voimassa oleva jäsentili myClub-palvelua hyödyntävään seuraan.

Playtomic connects you with a growing community of +2 millions padel & other racket sports players to enjoy playing together through unique & meaningful experiences all from our easy-to-use app. Get your initial level estimation through our sign up process and you will be ready to start playing Playtomic matches straight away.

CONNECT WITH PLAYERS
Either you know who to play with or don't, with Playtomic you will be able to find friends from your contact list, suggested players and nearby ones and follow them to play together easily, chat, track their progress... Because it's all about people!

PLAY PERFECT MATCHES
Whether you want to create a match to play with friends, make it public for others or find out active matches to join, you will have the power to play as you want. There will always be suggested matches for you to enjoy!

BOOK COURTS NEARBY
Don’t know where to play? Book any of our +16k clubs courts so you can play your perfect match. Whether you pay the whole booking or you split the payment with the other players, the court will be yours!

SIGN UP FOR COMPETITIONS
If you want to improve your level, compete in the court, rank, have fun and meet new players & clubs, join any Playtomic leagues & tournaments. It's a great opportunity for it to unleash your inner talent. Don't you think?

TRACK PROGRESS
Advanced statistics would not be available as a member of the Free Plan but you will have access to data such as your level progression, matches you played/won/lost or last results. Want an unlimited experience? Become Premium!

//////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE ////////////////////////////

SAVE MONEY
Being a Premium user you won't have to pay commissions per transaction even if you choose to split payments with the other players. So forget to pay fees, save money each match and enjoy the Playtomic unlimited experience!

GET PRIORITY ALERTS
As a Premium user, you will be able to create and customize your own priority alerts to get notifications about matches, courts and last minute opportunities. Worthy, right? Your time matters! And so do we.

PROMOTE YOUR MATCHES
Both the matches you create and those you take part in will be promoted as Golden Matches so that other players can find them easier and join faster. And to make sure you don't run out of courts, we'll assign one immediately. Good, isn't it?

GET ADVANCED STATISTICS
Getting knowledge about your performance, matches, sets and more like your best winning streak, your toughtest rivals, comparations with top performers... We will let you to challenge yourself, perform better & enjoy a meaningful Playtomic experience. Subscribe to Premium!

Take your snow days to the next level! Uncover detailed stats (and bragging rights) about your days skiing and snowboarding, ride with friends, log your memories, and replay your winter adventures together. Get the best ski tracking experience on iPhone and Apple Watch!

FIND YOUR FRIENDS ON THE MOUNTAIN
Slopes supports live location sharing: see where you are and where are your friends on the mountain. With the new live recording screen, you can easily find each other! Location sharing is opt-in and privacy-focused, you can always turn it on and off. It’s only for your friends, if you ride at the same time, same resort.

LIVE RECORDING on INTERACTIVE TRAIL MAPS (Premium)
Record on full-screen trail maps and map your runs at over 200 resorts in the US, Canada, the European Alps, Australia, New Zealand, and Japan (new interactive maps released throughout the season).

RESORT MAPS & CONDITIONS
Never get lost again with access to downloadable trail maps, right on your phone. And before you head up the mountain, check what other riders are saying about the snow quality at a resort.

SMART RECORDING
Slopes will automatically detect lifts and runs for you all day long. And with its Smart Reminders system, it can ping you if you get to a lift and hadn’t started recording yet (based on your list of resorts), or if you drive away and forgot to stop recording.

DETAILED STATISTICS
Uncover a wealth of information about your performance, know your speed, vertical, run times, distance, and more. Find out how good you are and how you’re getting even better, season-over-season.

FRIENDLY COMPETITIONS
Add your friends and compete against 8 different stats throughout the season. These leaderboards are 100% private, so you don’t have to worry about random strangers ruining the fun.

FITNESS + APPLE WATCH

PRIVACY-FOCUSED
Feel secure knowing Slopes never sells your data, and features are always designed with privacy and safety in mind. Accounts are optional, and you can Sign-in with Apple.

Track your darts games in the scoreboard in 6+ different game modes. Currently there is an extensive X01 game mode, as well as Cricket, Around the Clock, Shanghai, Elimination and Highscore. More game modes will be added all the time. For each game mode you have configuration options.
You can also customize the scoreboard, for example, you can choose the input method between "Whole round" and "Each dart individually".

VIEW STATISTICS
View extensive statistics about your dart games. There are many statistics for all game modes, which you can view both as a table and as a graph. In order not to lose the overview you can choose which statistics you want to see and which not.

ORGANIZE TOURNAMENTS
In tournament mode you can organize a league or knockout tournament with many people. A tournament schedule with a game list is automatically calculated and you can play the games one after the other. At any time you can see the current standings or who made it to the finals.

PLAY ONLINE AGAINST OTHERS
In the revamped online section, you can add your friends in the friends system and invite them to online matches. In addition, you can also create open lobbies and search for an opponent in the chat.
You can chat in the online area itself, in the lobby as well as during and after the game.
In the lobby and in the profiles of your opponents, you can see their abandonment rate and their usual average to decide if you want to enter the match.

SYNCHRONIZED ACROSS ALL PLATFORMS
Pro Darts is available on all platforms. If you use cloud players, your data is automatically synchronized on all your devices. So you won't lose stats and you'll be up to date on every device.

COMPETE AGAINST COMPUTERS
If you don't have a real opponent with you, you can train against computer opponents. Ten different difficulty levels are available. You can also add computer opponents in tournaments.

INTERVAL FUNCTION

LED-OFF: 
If the LEDs glow through a thin item of clothing, they can be deactivated. The heat output remains set as defined in the app.

Coloured rubber rings are delivered with the lithium packs. These help you to distinguish entire “battery pairs” from each other or to distinguish the batteries that are purposely to be used on the left and on the right. You can assign the colour of the rubber rings to the batteries in the app. 

LED SYSTEM:
